评论概述: Ill fitting with a cheap zipper
评论详情: The top and sleeves of this dress are large, while the skirt isn’t as long. My daughter is only 4’9”, but we needed a size 13 to get the length we needed. The zipper is cheap and broke the first time she tried it on. I was able to replace the zipper and alter the top of the dress to make it work, but it took a lot of effort to get it to that point.

Spaghetti strap was hanging on its last thread while still in its packaging. The moment I pulled it out and dangled the dress from my fingertips, the strap fell off. On top of that, zipper was getting stuck even though the dress was big on my daughter. I don’t necessarily think this is a big deal—I would’ve just taken it to the seamstress. However, some people rely last minute on an order for a special event and this is not one to rely on.
